thread.title: BRIEF-Endurance International Group Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.05

title: BRIEF-Endurance International Group Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.05
text:
May 1, 2018 / 11:11 AM / a minute ago BRIEF-Endurance International Group Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.05 Reuters Staff
May 1 (Reuters) - Endurance International Group Holdings Inc :
* ENDURANCE INTERNATIONAL GROUP REPORTS 2018 FIRST QUARTER RESULTS * Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.05
* Q1 REVENUE $291.4 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $290.8 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.12 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ENDURANCE INTERNATIONAL GROUP HOLDINGS SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA $310 TO $330 MILLION
* SEES 2018 GAAP REVENUE BETWEEN $1.140 BILLION TO $1.160 BILLION AS OF MAY 1, 2018
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $1.15 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
